snippet: California lawmakers on Thursday approved the creation of a new state holiday to honor Cesar Chavez, a founder of the United Farm Workers.    Mr. Chavez, who died in 1993, spent his life fighting for rights of people who work in the nation's field...
lead_paragraph: California lawmakers on Thursday approved the creation of a new state holiday to honor Cesar Chavez, a founder of the United Farm Workers. Mr. Chavez, who died in 1993, spent his life fighting for rights of people who work in the nation's fields and orchards.
abstract: California lawmakers approve creation of new state holiday to honor Cesar Chavez, founder of United Farm Workers who spent his life fighting for rights of agricultural laborers (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Chavez Holiday Bill Advances in California
